contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way

name: Electric Water Heater - With Installation
description:
Family of 3. 

Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: 3 Wall Fans (Includes installation)
description:
Family lives in public rental flat and have 1 pri school child and a 8-month-old baby. 
The house is crowded and stuffy. 
Father is the sole breadwinner doing food deliveries and mother is a home maker. 
Client is requesting for 3 wall fans to circulate the air at home.
Thank you.

name: Shower Water Heater
description:
Our client is experiencing homelessness and was residing at a S3P shelter for the past 6-7 months. 
He has received his keys for his rental flat in Dec 2021. 
However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.

description: Single mother caring for a school going child, staying in 1-rm rental flat. Client is requesting for a single double deck bed with pull out bed, so that it will free up space in the home so that there is space for other activities at home, such as reading space and family bonding.

name: 2 door wardrobe

Given that there are children ages 6, 4, 2 and < 1 yo living in the 4-room flat, the lack of window grilles pose as a safety hazard and the family hopes to source for kind donors for the request of window grilles.

name: 4 door cupboard
description: Client comes from a low income family as husband is currently the sole bread winner. Client is currently waiting for her 2 young children (8 months old and 3 years old) to get into infant & childcare so that she can start searching for a job to help support family’s finances. Their current 3 door cupboard is spoiled and they are in need of a new cupboard, hoping to get a bigger one (4 door cupboard).

name: Cupboard
description:
Low income elderly seniors who are staying in toa payoh rental block needs 2x standard sized cupboard to replace their existing ones as their house is infested with bed bugs. 

Please note that delivery fees need to be borne by donor and appreciate if donor can arrange for delivery directly to the elderly's home on week of 30 Jan 2022 onwards as we are arranging for fumigation and painting services before that date. 

Please reach out if you are able to bless and assist, thank you.

However, she does not have the means to get the necessary furniture, as her salary goes towards the basic necessities for the family. (Kamie/Faridah)

description: The baby is in need of 12 tins of Frisolac Gold AR milk formular now. These are for infants who require milk  formula containing Carob Bean Gum and this type is recommended by specialist. We welcome whatever quantities that the donor wishes to donate and there is no obligation on the minimum items donated. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg for delivery details. Thank you for your kind and generous support!

name: Cat foods and necessities

Family of six with 4 children are caring for 12 cats. They are facing financial difficulties this month due to a pay cut and would need help affording cat food and necessities while we assist them in rehoming their cats. Here are needed items: 
1. Wet food (Aastas Cat Soupy Stew Tuna)

3. Litter sand (Aatas Cat Kuick Klump)
4. Milk for kittens

The family faces chronic financial difficulties due to debts, and coupled with no income now, they are not able to make ends meet.

name: Groceries

name: Commode
description:
Mr Idris is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). Mr Idris is an unemployed senior who lives alone and has limited mobility, leading to possible fall risks at home and especially in the bathroom. He rarely receives visits from his children and depends on himself despite his old age. Mr Idris cooks, cleans and buys food and groceries for himself but has suffered numerous falls over the past year. 
  
THKMC is looking for a commode with pot and cover on wheels (detachable) to ensure safety as he is alone at home most days when he is showering or using the toilet.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact caseworker Danial Shamsudin @ 92310458.
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Wheelchair
description: Family with 2 school-going children requires a wheelchair as mother has mobility issues currently and requires a wheelchair to get around. Her husband is working as a driver full-time but they are not able to afford a wheelchair. Appreciate if wheelchair can be foldable to save space when not in use.

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Family of 3 living in a 2 room rental flat. Client unable to work at the moment as he is undergoing therapy for his medical condition. Wife is main caregiver of him and 7 year old young child. She is currently exploring employment to help supplement family's financial needs. The wheelchair will help to offset some financial costs from the family as it lessens cost of transportation. For further liaison of delivery information, please contact Nurul at 98598767 via whatsapp. Thank you.

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description:
Elderly client and her husband live together, no children, no income. Client is a caregiver to her husband who attends dementia daycare from Mon-Fri. Client usually stays home due to poor mobility and uses wheelchair when she goes out. Husband's PG controller of his motorized wheelchair is damaged and they're unable to afford repairs. 

Please contact Sarah at 97232082, or email sarahseetow@mws.sg

contact.org: MWS Active Ageing Centre - Kebun Baru
contact.name: Sarah Seetow

name: Wheelchair
description: Widowed father with 2 young children needs a size 24 wheelchair. Father has multiple medical condition (heart, high blood pressure, kidney issue etc) and is unable to work. His current wheelchair has broken down and needs extensive repairs.

name: Electric Wheelchair
description: Elderly person with no income recently discharged from hospital and is unable to walk independently. Hopes to receive a motorised wheelchair in order to assist him in ADL such as going out to buy groceries etc.

name: Ramp
description: Client is terminally ill and requires ramp for his toilet so commode can be pushed into toilet for showering/toileting.  Client is deteriorating and is having troubles ambulating and going to the toilet on his own. Patient is foreigner and hence does not qualify for any government grants, family would benefit from in-kind support to alleviate their financial burdens for patient's medical related expenses. Kindly contact me at 84282545.

name: Personal Mobility Aid
description:
Mr Seah is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). During his younger years, he fell from a tree and injured his spine. Since then, Mr Seah has been wheelchair bounded and as he lives alone, he relies on the PMA for his daily commute for food and groceries. Recently, his PMA started breaking down, with the battery’s lifespan going extremely short. He faces the risk of being stuck outside when the PMA suddenly runs out of power.
  
THKMC is looking for a new/used motorized Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) for Mr Seah to continue independence and mobility in the community.
   
If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please contact case worker Anthony at 96546542 or email: anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg.   
    
Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.    
   
THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Rollator Walker
description: Please WhatsApp Odelia at 8588 3163 during office hours or email to Odelia.Teo@THKMC.ORG.SG to liaise. Client is in her 50s. She had completely lost her eyesight in her right eye and is partially blind in her left eye. She also has mobility issues and is unable to walk for long without feeling fatigue and pain. She depends on the rollator walker to her rover around the community, but her current device is suffering from wear and tear. Due to her health condition, client is unable to work and hence has limited financial resources. She does not receive support from her family as well. Would greatly appreciate a donation of a rollator walker with a storage compartment that is in good condition.

Client has diabetes and chronic asthma which causes her to be unable to work. Client's 20-year-old daughter works to support the family. Client relies greatly on a Personal Mobility Aid (PMA) to move around as she has persistent giddiness and propensity to faint. Any form of injury to her body arising from a fall may potentially be life-threatening. Currently, she already has a PMA but needs battery replacement as current one is going very slow and might spoil soon.

description:
SUGGESTED:  https://www.lazada.sg/products/local-seller-aerogaz-az-983sf-lpg-pub-double-table-top-burner-2-days-delivery-i1946877577-s10832709920.html?


Family of 3. 
Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.
